segments.text: I notice the open cabinet with the big cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's labeled clearly, stuffed full of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs the stool to reach it, one hand inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His other holds a plate, perhaps for sharing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool's legs are splayed, ready to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands close, palm up in expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're teaming up for this cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the woman dries dishes at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It pours onto the floor, creating hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, yet she polishes away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is lovely, a nice escape.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, everything feels on the edge of chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt in this oblivious moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
